verses.verse: And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnath,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And he <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H8553>Timnath<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3947>get<s%> her for me to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Is there <S%H369>never<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> among the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> or among <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3947>Get<s%> her for me; for she <S%H3477>pleases<s%> <S%H5869><s%> me well.

But his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that it was of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he <S%H1245>sought<s%> an <S%H8385>occasion<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> for at that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnath,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H8553>Timnath:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roared<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on him, and he <S%H8156>rent<s%> him as he would have <S%H8156>rent<s%> a <S%H1423>kid,<s%> and he had <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H369><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> but he <S%H5046>told<s%> not his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H6213>done.<s%>
And he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with the <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she <S%H3477>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> well.

And after a <S%H3117>time<s%> he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and he <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4658>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H5712>swarm<s%> of <S%H1682>bees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> in the <S%H1472>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion.<s%>

And he <S%H7287>took<s%> thereof in his <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> on <S%H398>eating,<s%> and <S%H1980>came<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, and they did <S%H398>eat:<s%> but he <S%H5046>told<s%> not them that he had <S%H7287>taken<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H1472>carcass<s%> of the <S%H738>lion.<s%>

So his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H802>woman:<s%> and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4960>feast;<s%> for <S%H3651>so<s%> used the <S%H970>young<s%> men to <S%H6213>do.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, that they <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H4828>companions<s%> to be with him.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2330>put<s%> <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to you: <S%H518>if<s%> you can certainly <S%H5046>declare<s%> it me within the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and <S%H4672>find<s%> it out, then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of <S%H899>garments:<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> it me, then shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5466>sheets<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of <S%H899>garments.<s%> And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2330>Put<s%> <S%H2330>forth<s%> your <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> that we may <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Out of the <S%H398>eater<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3978>meat,<s%> and out of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4966>sweetness.<s%> And they <S%H3201>could<s%> not in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5046>expound<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H6601>Entice<s%> your <S%H376>husband,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us the <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> we <S%H8313>burn<s%> you and your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> have you <S%H7121>called<s%> us to <S%H3423>take<s%> that we have? is it not so?

And <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> You do but <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and <S%H157>love<s%> me not: you have <S%H2330>put<s%> <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have not <S%H5046>told<s%> it me. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have not <S%H5046>told<s%> it my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and shall I <S%H5046>tell<s%> it you?

And she <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> him the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> while their <S%H4960>feast<s%> <S%H1961>lasted:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H5046>told<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> she lay sore on him: and she <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of her <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H2775>sun<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> than <S%H1706>honey?<s%> And <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H5794>stronger<s%> than a <S%H738>lion?<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3884>If<s%> you had not <S%H2790>plowed<s%> with my <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> you had not <S%H4672>found<s%> out my <S%H2420>riddle.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> on him, and he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H2488>spoil,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2487>change<s%> of garments to them which <S%H5046>expounded<s%> the <S%H2420>riddle.<s%> And his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But <S%H8123>Samson's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> was given to his <S%H4828>companion,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had used as his <S%H7462>friend.<s%>
